channel.title: Docs on Scratch Addons
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Scratch Addons

item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Installing Let’s get started by installing Scratch Addons. Scratch Addons is available in both Chrome Web Store and Add-ons for Firefox. Chrome Web Store (for Google Chrome and other Chromium-based browsers) Add-ons for Firefox (for Mozilla Firefox) Empezando To get started, you need to access the settings page of the addon to see the functions of it. Locate Scratch Addons on the toolbar and click it.
